name: Bacformatics
tagline: BacFormatics Toolbox v0.7: MATLAB open-code platform to analyze dense bacterial communities
body:
### Welcome to BacFormatics.

BacFormatics Architecture, coding, optimization and debugging
----------------------------
Raz Shimoni, 
The ithree institute, Microbial Imaging Facility, University of Technology Sydney, Ultimo, NSW, 2007, Australia

### Acknowledgments

We wish to pay attribute and to acknowledge to the following open-code files and its contributors.
All files are located in BAC\open_code_lib\ with  '_BACWrapper' extension (without the '
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
